1566730.name: Scarlet Hood and the Wicked Wood - Original Soundtracks
1566730.description:
Scarlet Hood and the Wicked Wood is a fantasy adventure game set in the magical land of Glome. The story follows the adventures of Scarlet, a fledgling witch who must learn to wield the power of the Womping Stick to safely lead a troupe of Munchkin through the perils of the Wicked Wood. But can they survive the wrath of the wood's resident witch, LeFaba?

Lead composer Sung-woo Hwang sets the mood with an all-new, upbeat jazz soundtrack featuring a fantastical edge. Now, Devespresso Games is proud to present 18 selected tracks mixed and mastered by Hyunho Kim.

NOTE: Scarlet Hood and the Wicked Wood Original Soundtrack files are presented in MP3 format and placed in your game folder in the Steam Directory.
